page.title: 13PUBLIC HOUSES, West Cambs.
page.content:
Now only 3 PHs in survey area, several more locally, meeting place for local people and visitors.
Brington now has no pub, "Wheatsheaf" pulled down 1950s, bungalow on site
Catworth village, "Racehorse" opposite Fox Road. Formerly "Black Swan" with its own blacksmith, rebuilt 1909 with dining room extension 1972 seating 50. Local auctions held here (auctioneers from Thrapston) of property; produce from Harvest Festival in aid of Church
"Fox" on A604 built about 1800, serves bar snacks. Remembered as meeting point for local "teenagers" from several villages on Sunday afternoon walks. Had own petrol pump 1930s.
"Green Man" Leighton, serves meals.
